title: Google's new Chromecast is still the easiest way to make your TV smart
text:
Google's new Chromecast is still the easiest way to make your TV smart 
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Sometimes, the best products are the ones that are the simplest. Google's Chromecast, an HDMI dongle that lets you "cast" videos, music and ...
